title: Spicy Ginger Chutney/ Allam pachadi
content:
Ingredients: Ginger chopped - 1 tb sp Fresh grated coconut - 4 tb sp Dry red chillies - 2 Red chilli powder - 1 tea spoon Cumin seeds / Jeera - 1 tea spoon Coriander seeds - 1/2 tb sp Tamarind paste - 1/2 tb sp Jaggery powder - 1 tea spoon Coriander - 2 tb sp Salt - As per taste Oil - 1/2 tb sp Procedure:
  • Take a tempering pan
  • Add oil, chopped ginger fry till golden brown color with medium heat and take out in a bowl
  • In the same pan add Cumin seeds/ jeera, coriander and dry red chillies fry till the color changes to brown
  • Now in mixer grinder add fried jeera, coriander, dry red chillies, ginger, salt and jaggery powder make smooth paste
  • Next add tamarind paste, coriander leaves, red chili powder and fresh grated coconut make smooth paste if required add little amount of water
  • Serve it with any kind of dosa variety especially with Green gram Dosa/ Pesara Attu/ Moong Dal Dosa and idly
